entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 02:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: W 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
